name: Climbing the Dice Tower
description:
Switch between two perspectives: one a tabletop player, the other a platforming hero. As the tabletop player, you can roll a set of dice that will become platforms for your fantasy adventurer. Reach the flag at the top of the dice tower to beat the game. How many rolls will it take you?

CONTROLS

  • Move- WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Jump- Spacebar
  • Dash- S or Right Click

Created  by Lena Taylor for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Character Controller by AisuKaze Studio (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/metroidvania-controller-1667...)

Dice icons retrieved from https://game-icons.net

Music from the Classic JRPG Music Pack by Rest! (https://richarrest.itch.io/classic-jrpg-music-pack-grand-pack)
